root: ^That’s not a nice way to start a conversation with someone, young fox.

dialogueAfterGreeting: ^Do you know him? Is he okay?
^He has crossed the final stream? I didn’t even know.
^Yes. He didn’t have the courage to come and say hello to you in person.
^But I’m sure he would appreciate your company sometimes.
^He’s always been a bit shy, ever since he was a child.
^But thank you. It’s nice to hear from him. I’ll try to find him at some point.
